resources.string:
1.	To use the app click on the start button in the main menu. This will trigger a bubble on the screen that can be moved around on the screen

 2.	Open your preferred app that contains the ultrasound images of heart that you want analyze

 3.	Click on the bubble, and you will see a menu pop up under the bubble

 4.	Click on the QUALITY button. To choose the frame place your finger on the screen and slide diagonally to pick the correct size

 				 - If the frame is not ideal, you can click on the bubble again and click on REFRAME button to choose the frame again 

 5.	After the size is chosen, a new layout pops up that contains the quality bar, predicted view and ejection fraction calculation ( EF is available for AP4 and AP2 views only)

 7.	Remember that to get the most accurate EF calculation the heart view quality ideally needs to be high (green region)
 8. To stop the app move the bubble into the the cancel icon at the bottom of the screen

 This app was developed by Robotics and Control Labs in University of British Columbia for research purposes only.
